TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: KSPTV to stream KSP 1.0

Articles.Content:
I thought das said they had access since experimental started but he had avoided them till last his stream?

There are 2 teams. There is a media team, who is doing all this on Twitch, and there's an experimentals team, that is doing the testing. I do not know, but I don't think that everybody in the media team is also on the experimentals team. You need a pretty different skill set for each.

Scott Manley is a good example of someone who is on both teams, but he's been busy with extra-ksp activities so I don't know how prepared he'll be, either.

I haven't touched 1.0 but I feel like I'd do a better job than most of these people of showcasing the new features.
